com.ppdai.tutorial

类 Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ppdai.tutorial.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Full game implementation.

    This game uses three decks of cards: 1x - Emperor's com.ppdai.tutorial.Deck 1x - Plebeian's com.ppdai.tutorial.Deck 1x - Fate com.ppdai.tutorial.Deck

    RULES: 1) At the beginning of each game, the player draws a fate card. - if the fate is of riches, the player uses the emperor deck - if the fate is of revolution, the player uses the plebeian deck 2) Each player reveals the top card of their deck - Emperor beats Patrician - Patrician beats Plebeian - Plebeian beat Emperor 3) Repeat Rule 2 if both players reveal a patrician

    Scoring: If the player wins using the Emperor com.ppdai.tutorial.Deck, they get 1 point. If the player wins with the Plebeian com.ppdai.tutorial.Deck, they get 4 points.

        public Game()

    • 方法详细资料

      • playOnce

        public int playOnce()
        Ensures that all decks are ready to play, and passes the decks to the play() method. This separation makes the stochastic nature of this game easier to control during testing.
        返回:
        The total number of points the player either won or lost

      • play

        public int play(EmperorsDeck emperorsDeck,
                PlebeiansDeck plebeianDeck,
                FateDeck fateDeck)
        Play one round of Fate.

        Returns the point value of the player's perspective when a win condition based on rule 2 is achieved.

        参数:
        emperorsDeck - The shuffled-and-readied Emperor's com.ppdai.tutorial.Deck
        plebeianDeck - The shuffled-and-readied Plebeian's com.ppdai.tutorial.Deck
        fateDeck - The shuffled-and-readied Fate com.ppdai.tutorial.Deck
        返回:
        The number of points the player (not opponent) receives
